channel.title: poop on Barefoot Rob

item.title: dream used wrong toilet
item.description: 04:41 Monday 09 July 2018 JST While on campus at a university I needed to use the restroom to go number 2, but all the restrooms had lines. From experience, I knew that the restrooms on higher floors had shorter lines, but I had to go up to a floor I had never previously seen. I got to some kind of room with a lectern and chairs and wanted to see what was on the next floor, but it was locked.
